name: The Living Flow 0.1
description:
The story follows a newly born human in a multiverse existence, who seems very weak and afraid of everything. Version 0.1 is available.

A quick breakdown of the what the game is about:

  • The story takes place in an alternate existence where multiple universes exist, dimensions if you will.
  • Humans live in the communal realm, but a few can travel to their own "birth realm"
  • Humans posses unimaginable powers unique to each individual, but few ever access this power.
  • Those who do access this power are called Binders.
  • Three levels of binders exist: Level 1, 2 and 3 binders.
  • Demons are the real enemy seeking to destroy or control humans to gain access to their powers.
  • This game will be the first episode in a series.

The player will travel through various town maps with several locations each. The player will have to make life and death decisions and battle demons using the Binder battle system. The Binder battle system allows the player to create their own attacks, defenses and alterations using a combination of 1, 2 or 3 seed words and one key word. There are 9 seed words and 3 keywords to chooses from and the effects are minor in the beginning but as the story develops, so does the main character's powers and eventually ... well, demons will fear you. Most of these features are not available in the intro, but will become available from version 0.2.

Content:

  • Violence
  • Fear
  • Anger
  • Love
  • Betrayal
  • Action
  • Superpowers
  • Nudity
  • Sexual content
  • Depression
  • Demons
  • And that is just the beginning!
